name: Soothsayer
description: SpiritWalkers who have developed the ability to perceive the threads of fate and destiny, gaining profound insights into past, present, and future events through communion with spirits of time and knowledge.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers spells and spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when near places of power or temporal anomalies
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast spells and invoke spiritual powers
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming mana over time
Communing with spirits of time and knowledge increases mana regeneration rate by 500%
Depleted mana causes penalties to spell effectiveness and divination accuracy
Can channel mana into divination tools, fate weaving, and temporal anchors
Successful divinations restore a portion of spent mana

resource_systems.name: Spirit Attunement
resource_systems.description: Connection to the spirit world that enhances spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when communing with spirits of knowledge and time, decreases when ignoring spiritual insights
mechanics: Increases by 20 when performing divination rituals
Increases by 15 per minute when in places of great historical significance
Decreases by 20 when ignoring prophetic warnings or spiritual guidance
Decreases by 15 per minute when in places where time flows abnormally
Can be spent to enhance divination abilities or commune with ancient spirits
Higher Spirit Attunement increases the accuracy and range of divination abilities

resource_systems.name: Planar Resonance
resource_systems.description: Harmony with the different planes of existence that allows for dimensional manipulation
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when traversing between planes or communing with extraplanar entities of knowledge
mechanics: Increases by 15 when successfully traversing between planes
Increases by 10 when observing significant events across multiple planes
Decreases by 15 when causing planar disruptions or temporal anomalies
Decreases by 10 when remaining in a single plane for extended periods
Can be spent to glimpse alternate timelines or parallel realities
Higher Planar Resonance allows for more accurate cross-planar divination

resource_systems.name: Temporal Insight
resource_systems.description: Understanding of time's flow and the threads of fate that allows for divination
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when observing pivotal moments or making accurate predictions
mechanics: Increases by 15 when witnessing historically significant events
Increases by 20 when a major prediction comes to pass
Decreases by 10 when making incorrect predictions
Decreases by 15 when attempting to drastically alter predetermined events
Can be spent to enhance divination accuracy or temporarily perceive multiple timelines
At maximum Temporal Insight, gain perfect clarity of past, present, and potential futures

class_mechanics.name: Fate Weaving
class_mechanics.description: Ability to perceive and subtly manipulate the threads of fate
effects: Can see the immediate consequences of potential actions
Able to identify critical decision points that will significantly alter fate
Can subtly influence probability to favor desired outcomes
Presence naturally stabilizes chaotic or random events
Can detect when others are attempting to manipulate fate

class_mechanics.name: Temporal Vision
class_mechanics.description: Ability to perceive events across time
effects: Can view past events with perfect clarity by communing with spirits who witnessed them
Able to glimpse potential futures based on current circumstances
Can identify objects or people displaced from their proper time
Presence causes temporal anomalies to stabilize
Can detect disturbances in the flow of time across great distances

class_mechanics.name: Spirit of Knowledge
class_mechanics.description: Deep connection to spirits of knowledge and wisdom
effects: Can commune with spirits who possess specific knowledge or skills
Able to temporarily access memories and knowledge from ancient spirits
Can identify the true nature and history of objects or places
Presence encourages the sharing of knowledge and truth
Can detect lies, illusions, and hidden information with great accuracy

class_mechanics.name: Astral Projection
class_mechanics.description: Advanced ability to project consciousness across space, time, and planes
effects: Can project consciousness to distant locations to observe events in real-time
Able to enter the dreams and memories of others with their permission
Can traverse the astral plane to reach otherwise inaccessible locations
Projected form can interact with spirits and some physical objects
Can maintain awareness of physical body while projecting

signature_abilities.name: Moment of Perfect Clarity
signature_abilities.description: Achieve a state of perfect understanding of past, present, and future
mechanics: For 5 minutes, gain perfect knowledge of all events related to a specific question or situation
See all possible outcomes of current circumstances with their probability
Identify exactly what actions would lead to specific desired outcomes
Perceive hidden influences, motivations, and connections related to the situation
Knowledge gained is comprehensive but temporary—must be recorded or acted upon quickly
Costs 100 Mana, 50 Spirit Attunement, and 75 Temporal Insight

signature_abilities.name: Council of Ancients
signature_abilities.description: Summon the spirits of ancient sages and seers for guidance
mechanics: Summon 3-7 spirits of legendary wise beings from across history
Spirits will answer questions truthfully based on their vast knowledge
Can provide insights on any subject, though specialties vary by spirit
May offer conflicting perspectives based on their different experiences
Council lasts for up to 1 hour or until dismissed
Costs 75 Mana, 30 Spirit Attunement, and 50 Planar Resonance

signature_abilities.name: Fate Manipulation
signature_abilities.description: Temporarily alter the threads of fate to change an outcome
mechanics: Can dramatically alter probability to change the outcome of a single event
Effect is subtle but powerful—makes highly improbable outcomes possible
Cannot directly violate natural laws but can push their boundaries
Using this ability creates temporal ripples that may have unforeseen consequences
Most effective when used at critical decision points identified through divination
Costs 50 Mana, 100 Temporal Insight, and 25 Planar Resonance

skill_trees.name: Path of Divination
skill_trees.focus: Techniques for seeing past, present, and future
key_abilities: Comprehensive Divination: Gain detailed visions about a specific person, object, or event
Danger Sense: Automatically receive warnings about imminent threats
Timeline Viewing: Observe the complete history and potential futures of an object or location

skill_trees.name: Path of the Sage
key_abilities: Perfect Recall: Gain perfect memory of everything you've experienced or learned
Skill Channeling: Temporarily gain the skills and knowledge of an ancestral spirit
Universal Translation: Understand and speak any language after brief exposure

skill_trees.name: Path of the Astral
key_abilities: Dreamwalking: Enter and manipulate the dreams of others
Multiple Projection: Create several astral forms simultaneously
Astral Manipulation: Affect the physical world while in astral form

quests: Communion with the Spirits of Fate
Observation of a Pivotal Historical Event
advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Planar Traveler skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Neutral alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Successfully predict three major events before they occur
Commune with a spirit from the distant past

legendary_items.name: Crystal of Infinite Visions
effects: Intelligence increased by 5
Divination abilities are 30% more accurate and detailed
Can store up to three visions for later viewing by others

legendary_items.name: Cloak of the Timeless One
effects: Temporal Insight regeneration increased by 100%
Time flows differently around you—aging slowed by 90%
Can briefly step outside the normal flow of time once per day

legendary_items.name: Circlet of the All-Seeing
effects: Spirit Attunement maximum increased by 50
Can see invisible, ethereal, and temporally displaced entities
Moment of Perfect Clarity cooldown reduced by 2 days

lore: Soothsayers represent the pinnacle of divination and temporal insight among SpiritWalkers, having developed an unprecedented ability to perceive the threads of fate and commune with spirits of knowledge and time. These mystical seers have transcended ordinary perception, gaining the ability to glimpse past events with perfect clarity and potential futures with remarkable accuracy. The path to becoming a Soothsayer requires not only exceptional spiritual sensitivity but also a profound understanding of the interconnected nature of all events and a mind capable of processing complex temporal information. Those who succeed find themselves blessed with visions and insights that can guide entire communities through times of uncertainty and change. Soothsayers typically maintain a neutral stance in conflicts, understanding that maintaining the balance of fate often requires allowing both positive and negative events to unfold naturally. Many serve as advisors to leaders, providing guidance based on their visions while carefully avoiding direct interference in events that must occur. Others dedicate themselves to preserving historical knowledge, communing with spirits of the past to record events that might otherwise be lost to time. Their ability to project their consciousness across vast distances and even into other planes of existence makes them invaluable for gathering information that would be inaccessible by conventional means. Though they possess tremendous insight, Soothsayers understand the responsibility that comes with their power, knowing that revealing too much about the future can sometimes prevent necessary events from occurring or cause panic and chaos.
